July 11, 1967
Mr. Donald F. Holloway
Associate Professor of Speech
Morehead state University
Morehead, Kentucky 40351
Dear Mr. Holloway:
It was a pleasure to receive your recent letter in support
of H.R. 6736 and the related bills which would extend and
improve the system of grants for construction of educational
radio and television broadcasting facilities. As you
may know the Committee is holding hearings on this measure
at the present time. You may feel assured that your
endorsement of this legislation has been duely noted.
With kindest regards, I am
DK;md
